#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    
    while(cin>>n)
    {
       int ar[n];
       long sum=0;
       
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
         cin>>ar[i];
         sum=sum+ar[i];
       }    
       
       for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
       {
         cout<<ar[i]<<" ";
       }
       cout<<"\n"<<sum<<"\n";
    }
   return 0;
}
